title: QGIS + Mapper + Blogpost Expert
job_overview:
Remote | Type: Full-Time or Part-Time

We are seeking a skilled GIS professional with strong proficiency in QGIS, mapping, and CVAT annotation, who can also produce clear, professional blog content to support marketing and outreach efforts.

Key Responsibilities:
-Develop accurate, visually compelling maps using QGIS or other relevant tools
-Support CVAT annotation projects (e.g., object labeling, QA review)
-Write informative, technically sound blog posts on GIS workflows, case studies, and tools
-Collaborate on geospatial analysis, data visualization, and automation tasks

Requirements:
-Proven experience with QGIS
-Familiarity with CVAT or similar annotation platforms
-Excellent written communication and technical writing skills
-Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently
-Bonus: Experience with Mapbox, Leaflet, or other web mapping libraries

To Apply: Please submit a brief introduction, a summary of your relevant experience, and samples of your work (maps, annotation output, or writing).
